page.title: 17Newcastle Police Station
page.content: Today we visited the Police Station in Newcastle.First we went to see the cells.There are four cells.So far this year (7th June) 700 people have passed through the cells.There is also a cell for juveniles. Next we went to see the vehicles.There was a 1979 BMW motor bike.It has done 76,000 miles.I sat on the bike.It is very big and has a loud siren.Then we saw a Range Rover that had a light on its roof that could be raised to a height of fifteen feet in an emergency so that drivers could see it earlier. The Range Rover also has a siren. We then went to the Crime Prevention Office where we were shown different locks.We saw a collection of offensive weapons taken off people at football matches.I had my fingerprints taken. Finally we saw a film about looking after our bikes.
